note:
I wrote about mobile games for a decade as EiC of TouchArcade.com before returning to the world of startups. These days Iâ€™m on the production side of the mobile game industry, working on a few different F2P games based on licensed IP and a VR game! I work from home on Watts Bar Lake in Tennessee w/ my partner and two wiener dogs.

I spend my time on here mainlining internet culture and tootin' about game dev junk, the misadventures of my small-time local construction company, and hot takes.
